title: I wish Ghostcrawler was still with Blizzard
body: So he could continue to destroy WoW and not League as well.

replies.body: So many things wrong with the game. DFG GONE.. TURRETS DO LIKE HALF YOUR HEALTH IN 1 SHOT. The game is beginning to look like heroes of the storm. Everyone QQ'ING about op champs on threads. Cannot even snowball anymore. Also the stats from dragon are useless. I would rather have 200g every dragon then these stupids stacks.
